metadata.name: File Creation In Suspicious Directory By Msdt.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects msdt.exe creating files in suspicious directories which could be a sign of exploitation of either Follina or Dogwalk vulnerabilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\msdt.exe')) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\start menu\\programs\\startup\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\users\\public\\'))))

output.summary: Detects msdt.exe creating files in suspicious directories which could be a sign of exploitation of either Follina or Dogwalk vulnerabilities
